001import javax.swing.JButton;
002import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
003import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
004import javax.swing.JDialog;
005
006/**
007 * Décrivez votre classe TargetButton ici.
008 *
009 * @author (votre nom)
010 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
011 */
012public class TargetButton extends JButton implements ActionListener {
013    private UserInterface aUI;
014    private JDialog aDialog;
015    
016    public TargetButton(final String pText, final UserInterface pUI, final JDialog pDialog) {
017        super(Module.camelCase(pText));
018        this.aUI = pUI;
019        this.aDialog = pDialog;
020        this.addActionListener(this);
021    }
022    
023    @Override
024    public void actionPerformed(final ActionEvent pE) {
025        String vSecondWord = this.getText().split(" ")[0].toLowerCase();
026        PopupButton.SECOND_WORD = vSecondWord;
027        PopupButton.setTarget(this.getText()); // Changer les target
028        
029        //
030        if(PopupButton.SECOND_WORD.equals("")) {
031            return;
032        } else if(PopupButton.SECOND_WORD.equals("salle")) {
033            this.aUI.getGE().interpretCommand(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD);
034        } else if(PopupButton.SECOND_WORD.equals("moi")) {
035            this.aUI.getGE().interpretCommand(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD);
036        } else if(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD.equals("talk")) {
037            PNJ vTarget = GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.get(vSecondWord);
038            TalkButton.talkTo(this.aUI.getGE().getMC(), vTarget, this.aUI, this.aUI.getGE());
039        } else if(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD.equals("trade")) {
040            PNJ vTarget = GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.get(vSecondWord);
041            TradeWindow vTW = new TradeWindow(this.aUI.getGE().getMC(), vTarget, this.aUI, this.aUI.getGE());
042        } else {
043            this.aUI.getGE().interpretCommand(PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD + " " + vSecondWord);
044        }
045        PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD = "";
046        PopupButton.SECOND_WORD = "";
047        this.aUI.getLog().setCaretPosition(this.aUI.getLog().getDocument().getLength());
048        
049        this.aDialog.dispose();
050    }
051}
